example.text: I will not stand idle while the Biden Admin politicizes the VA and spreads false claims about the Limit, Save, Grow Act cutting veterans' benefits. I joined [[user]] and my [[user]] colleagues to call on Sec. McDonough to retract the dishonest claims. [[url]]

?Ford just announced they will keep AM radio in all 2024 vehicles. This decision comes following the introduction of the AM for Every Vehicle Act - bipartisan legislation I'm leading to require ALL automakers to maintain AM radio in their vehicles. [[url]]
?We just passed legislation to secure the southern border and protect our communities? [[url]]
?We just passed legislation to secure the southern border and protect our communities? [[url]]

I've sponsored legislation and signed onto oversight letters to protect American farmland from land grabbing from our foreign adversaries like the Chinese Communist Party. The future of Arkansas is bright, and ensuring that fate starts with protecting our farmland and guaranteeing the industry is in good hands.
